markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Bonds of Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3489) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 35</row>

**Archetype** [Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=175)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Reanimator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3486)

**Requirements**
You have cast [_animate dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=666) this turn.

</column>

---

You sway with the motions of your spells that animate the dead, channeling your power to sustain two at the same time. You Sustain your previous casting of _animate dead_, binding the necromantic energy of the two spells together with metaphysical twine. On subsequent rounds, you can Sustain both _animate dead_ spells with a single action to Sustain the Spell. This benefit lasts until either of the spells ends.

requirement: You have cast   animate dead   this turn.
